fallback_response: I'm not sure about that. Please contact our team directly.

faq_examples.a: Yes, we do, but we recommend booking ahead to avoid waiting.

faq_examples.q: How long does a full service wax take?
faq_examples.a: About 45 minutes to an hour depending on vehicle size.

special_notes: Closed on public holidays. Free Wi-Fi available while you wait!
